metadata.synopsis: A British sergeant (William Hartnell) turns his last batch of misfit recruits into the top troops in camp.

reviews: An army-camp farce from Britain. It offers two or three genuinely satirical moments in the midst of a welter of tired musichall slapstick.
The professional skill of William Hartnell and Dora Bryan lends some reality and humour to this conventional farce, in which all the characters come from stock.
